sentences.sContent: In the current economic climate (= conditions ), we must keep costs down.
sentences.sCn: 在当前的经济形势下，我们一定要控制好成本。

sentences.sContent: ...China experienced sharp economic growth and became the world's most advanced economy...
...And eventually brings economic prosperity and social harmony...
...International Labor Organization economists say some nations have come up with policies to lessen the impact of lower wages during the economic crisis...
...maintain that environmental progress needs to go hand-in-hand with economic development...
...is what will ultimately determine whether the human race is living beyond its ecological means as it pursues economic revival...
...Optimists say that more robots will lead to greater productivity and economic growth...
...economic losses have increased by a factor of 50...
...is hard to determine with any precision—which is why governments and financial institutions are only beginning to bring such risks into their economic calculations...
...some indicator which would rate the wealth of nations in both economic and environmental terms and show a relationship between the two...
...the Chinese government established Shenzhen special economic zone to pilot the socialist market economy...
